14. Contact and communicationÂ¶

  • #pylib on irc.freenode.net: you are welcome to lurk or ask questions!
  • py-dev developers list development mailing list.
  • tetamap: Holger Krekel’s blog, often about testing and py.test related news.
  • py-svn general commit mailing list to follow all development commits.
  • development bug/feature tracker this roundup instance serves to file bugs and track issues. (soon to be substitued by a google-code or other hosted one).
  • merlinux.eu offers teaching and consulting services.
